gw.api.exposure

Class ClaimExposuresFilterSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.exposure.ClaimExposuresFilterSet

  • public class ClaimExposuresFilterSet
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides the filter set for the LV showing a Claim's Exposures. The LV is filtered by Claimants, allowing the user to see only the Exposures for a single Claimant or to see all Exposures.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static ClaimExposuresFilterSet INSTANCE
      The singleton instance of this filter set.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      com.guidewire.pl.system.filters.QueryBasedQueryFilter getAll()
      Gets the "all" filter, which does no filtering.
      com.guidewire.pl.system.filters.BeanBasedQueryFilter[] getFilterOptions(Claim claim)
      Gets an array of BeanBasedQueryFilters, one for each Claimant on the Exposures of the specified claim.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • INSTANCE

        The singleton instance of this filter set.

      • getAll

        public com.guidewire.pl.system.filters.QueryBasedQueryFilter getAll()

        Returns:
        the "all" filter, which does no filtering.

      • getFilterOptions

        public com.guidewire.pl.system.filters.BeanBasedQueryFilter[] getFilterOptions(Claim claim)
        Gets an array of BeanBasedQueryFilters, one for each Claimant on the Exposures of the specified claim.
        Parameters:
        claim - the claim
        Returns:
        array of BeanBasedQueryFilter representing the Claimants available to filter by.
